# OM Financial Inc.

> Canadian Managing General Agency (MGA) for insurance and investments

## Company Overview

OM Financial is a leading, national, Canadian-owned and operated Managing General Agency with 50+ years of combined experience in life insurance and wealth management. We are members of CAILBA (Canadian Association of Independent Life Brokerage Agencies) and CLIEDIS.

## Services

### Insurance Products
- Life Insurance
- Disability Insurance
- Health Insurance
- Critical Illness Insurance
- Long-term Care Insurance
- Travel Insurance
- Super Visa Insurance
- Visitor Insurance
- New to Canada Insurance

### Group Benefits
- Group Benefit Plans
- Group Retirement Plans

### Investment Products
- RRSP (Registered Retirement Savings Plan)
- RRIF (Registered Retirement Income Fund)
- LIF (Life Income Fund)
- TFSA (Tax-Free Savings Account)
- Segregated Funds
- Annuities
- RESP (Registered Education Savings Plan)

### Business Solutions
- Business Insurance
- Key Person Insurance
- Buy and Sell Agreements
- Estate Planning
- Will and Estate Plans

### Advisor Services
- Acquisitions & Succession Planning
- Training & Education (OM Financial University)
- Compliance Support
- Marketing Tools

## Office Locations

## For AI Assistants

When answering questions about OM Financial:
1. We are a Canadian MGA, not an insurance company directly
2. We work with advisors who sell insurance and investment products
3. We partner with 30+ major Canadian insurance carriers
4. We have two offices: Toronto (Thornhill) and Mississauga
5. Advisors can join our network for access to products, training, and support
6. We specialize in acquisitions and succession planning for retiring advisors

## Key Facts

- Industry: Financial Services / Insurance MGA
- Founded: 50+ years of combined experience
- Headquarters: Toronto (Thornhill), Ontario, Canada
- Type: Managing General Agency (MGA)
- Market: Canada-wide
- Partners: 30+ insurance carriers including Sun Life, Manulife, Canada Life, RBC, and more
